verses.name: Psalms 138:6
verses.text: Though the Lord be high, yet hath he respect unto the lowly: but the proud he knoweth afar off.

verses.name: Psalms 138:7
verses.text: Though I walk in the midst of trouble, thou wilt revive me: thou shalt stretch forth thine hand against the wrath of mine enemies, and thy right hand shall save me.

verses.name: Psalms 138:8
verses.text: The Lord will perfect that which concerneth me: thy mercy, O Lord, endureth for ever: forsake not the works of thine own hands.
